description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析。
description.en: This course is designed to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程著重於中英文口頭報告能力之培養，在模擬發表過程中，培養學生使用正確的表達用法，並建立適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English languages via simulated presentations in class. Students will learn how to present their papers precisely and how to engage a conversation properly.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills. Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論,線性規劃法,非線性規劃法,多目標函數最佳化, 近代數學規劃法介紹與應用。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts, Linear programming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques and applications.

name.en: Introduction to the Constitutional Systems in Mainland China

description.zh: 兩岸關係向來牽動台灣的定位與發展，兩岸立國以來不同的憲政體制更是影響兩岸發展的關鍵。本課程首先說明兩岸憲政體制的基礎，並以簡略的歷史回顧，基本人權，政府體制與國家政策等議題研究兩岸發展概況，增進同學對兩岸的了解與關心。
description.en: The mutual relationship across Taiwan Strait has played a keynote role in deciding what the future position of Taiwan will be and what way Taiwan will develop onto. The totally different constitutional systems in the two sides, moreover, have exerted the greatest impact on the future political development. This course discusses some basic foundations which lead to the different constitutional systems across the strait. With a brief retrospect of the history, an introduction of the importance of human rights, a comparison between the governmental organizations and national policies, this course will prove to be of great help to the students in understanding the mutual relationship between Mainland China and Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程以戰後臺灣政治與社會的變遷做為討論的重點，講授內容包括半世紀以來臺灣的民主政治、經濟發展、對外關係以及文教、社會變遷等。希望透過本課程的研讀，能讓學生對戰後臺灣的發展有較全面性的瞭解。
description.en: The course focuses on how the political and social changes take place in Taiwan after World War II. The discussion topics include: the democratic politics, economic development, foreign affairs policies and the changes--cultural, educational and social-- over the past half century in Taiwan. It is our hope that the students will get a far more comprehensive picture of the post-war development in Taiwan.

name.zh: 就業達人講座-職場自我行銷

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「就業達人講座-職場自我行銷」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試應對技巧、魅力溝通表達、職場自我行銷、以及職場生涯規劃等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

notes: 四光四.光電所和最後一哩合開,三ABC節上課,限150人

description.zh: 本課程介紹網路行銷各種重點技巧，包括社群行銷與、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路創業與行銷的實務規劃之能力。
description.en: As a business owner, it is essential to understand the different options and technologies available. Using Internet marketing you have the following benefits 1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users 3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information.

notes: 四工四甲乙和最後一哩合開,限160人

name.en: Aesthetics Approach to Architecture and Environment

description.zh:
本課程涵蓋建築美學和環境美學兩大部分，旨在培養學生建築與環境的美學鑑賞力與美感能力、最終能對建築專業有所提升。
課程分為四部分：
1 中西方美學知識論
2 建築美學發展脈絡
3 環境美學發展脈絡
4 當前建築美學課題與專業的啟發
description.en:
This course is about Aesthetics approach to Architecture and Environmen that is aimed to establish connoisseurship on architecture and environment, and therefore enhance ability toward design practice. 
The class includes four parts:
1 The Aesthetics epistemology   
2 The context of Architectural aesthetics
3 the context of Environmental aesthetics
4 Contemporary issues on aesthetics inspirations from the professionals.

description.zh: 設計專業用進階德文；設計專業德文導讀及加強德文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，概念理解及溝通設計用之德文。
description.en: The alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of advanced German to building the capability of reading, speaking, writing and understanding the design advanced German.

description.zh: 介紹陶瓷材料、不同成型技法、釉藥知識及燒窯過程。在課堂實習手捏成型、圈條成型、拉坏成型等多種不同成型方法及表面設計應用在陶瓷作品之練習。
description.en: This course aims to develop student's potential in ceramics and pottery making, and to encourage a practical and theoretical understanding of skills and techniques of pottery making process.

notes: 四設三(需修過陶瓷創作一)

description.zh:
1.照明光源及燈具介紹：白熾燈、螢光燈、弧光燈、LED燈
2.輻射度學、光度學、色度學之基本物理概念與單位
3.照明光度學之量測方法與儀器介紹
4.點光源之照度計算 
5.多光源之平均照度計算 
6.照度之品質與評價
7.幾何光學：折射、反射、全反射、散射、材料色散、吸收、螢光激發 
8.LED的發光原理與特性指標：顏色、效率、壽命、光形、光譜、熱散 
9.白光LED的特徵：色溫、演色性 
10.LED光源的封裝與二次光學透鏡
description.en:
1.(Lighting Luminaire: Incandescent Lamp, Fluorescent Lamp, High Intensity Discharge lamp, LED Lamp)
2.concepts and Units of Radiometry/Photometry/Colorimetry
3.Photometry Test Method and Understanding Test Report
4.Calcuating Illuminance at a Point
5.Average illuminance Calculation
6.Quantity and Quality of Illumination
7.Geometric optics
8.Characteristics of LED 
9.White light LED Characteristics: CCT and CRI
10.Optical package and Secondary optics for LED

notes: 四光四.光電所和最後一哩合開,限8人

description.zh: 對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力系統控制，系統保護。
description.en: Symmetrical components, unbalanced fault, generator model, stability, voltage control system, power system control,

description.zh: 培養學生具有對於現今專利法規、申請審查、專利說明書及其撰寫的相關認識，將專利權的概念植入研發精神中，進而運用於其研究計畫之先前規劃及研究方向之擬定上，縮短學術研究與產業應用的落差，並以專利權來保護研發成果。課程內容：如何分析一份專利文件，親自撰寫一份好的專利說明書，如何作專利組合規劃，瞭解專利申請的每一程序。
description.en: Want to protect the achievement of researching and developing with the patent right, the most important condition is to write a suitable patent specification. This course aims at letting students understand: How to analyze a patent document; How to write a good patent specification; How to make the patent portfolio planning; Understand each procedure of application for patent.

notes: 四機三甲和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 本科目旨在探討人們的選擇行為，亦即如何利用有限的資源，以滿足人類無限的慾望。個體經濟學著眼於價格機能之方析，範圍涵蓋：消費者行為、廠商理論、各種市場的結構分析、以及公共部門的決策。
description.en: Economics explores choice behavior of human beings. Especially, it concerns how people make choice in order to satisfy their unlimited desire under limited resources. Microeconomics focuses on the analysis of price mechanism which involves consumer behavior, firms' decision making, structure of various markets, and public sector.

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解多國企業所面對的國際財務管理的議題、其理論及實務。內容包括外匯市場、國際套利、外匯衍生性商品、外匯風險暴露管理、境外市場及國際投資組合管理。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the theory and practice of the international financial management issues faced by multinational corporations. The course includes the following topics: foreign exchange, foreign exchange arbitrage, foreign exchange derivatives, risk exposure management, offshore market, and the international portfolio management.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解服務業管理相關的實務作法。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The students will have a clear service management operation by well-selected case study.

description.zh: 講授各種電機機械的工作原理及特性，內容包含：磁路分析、變壓器、旋轉電機原理、直流機、多相感應馬達、單相感應馬達、同步機、伺服及步進馬達。
description.en: To teach the principles and characteristics of electrical machinery, this course includes the subjects of analysis of magnetic circuits, transformers, principles of rotating electric machinery, direct-current machines, multiple-phase induction motors, single-phase induction motors, synchronous machines, servo and step motors.

description.zh:
先修課程：3001051或負責教授同意。
本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本、內容包括二維製圖、三維製圖、修訂功能表、命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

name.zh: 國際觀培養-越南文化與語言Ⅱ
name.en: Development of global perspective:Vietnam culture and languageⅡ

description.zh: 課程以培養基礎越南語溝通能力、激發學習越南語興趣為宗旨。課程架構由發音學習開始，以奠定良好基礎，並以基礎語法與簡單對話為目標，培養學生越南語簡易聽、說、讀、寫能力。另外，結合多元化議題討論，增進其認識越南文化特色及台灣與越南經貿往來之現況，使其具備越南商務基本實力。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with the ability to communicate in Vietnamese and to stimulate students' interest. The course will start with the teaching of pronunciation and followed by basic grammar and simple conversation. Students are expected to have the ability to speak, listen, read and write. Furthermore, we will be discussing cross-cultural topics in our course. It is hoped that students can be familiar with Vietnamese culture and the current situation of economic and trade exchanges between Vietnam and Taiwan.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en:
In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.
This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

notes: 四土四乙和最後一哩合開,限30人

name.zh: 國際專業證照研訓實務進階講座
name.en: Practice Advance Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本國際專業證照研訓實務進階講座課程針對國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。本學期專門培訓學生通過Microsoft 國際證照之PowerPoint 與Access為目標，以協助同學同時取得Microsoft大師級證照。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices advance of international professional licenses in business and management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation. This semester will help students to pass the licenses of PowerPoint and Access, and further to obtain the master license.

notes: 四管三和最後一哩合開,限50人

name.zh: 國際觀培養-國際商業脈動
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Global Business Trends

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管二.經管所和最後一哩合開,限300人,周二ABC上課

description.zh: 本課程主旨在介紹一個企業集團如何創業、擴充事業版圖、多角化經營。企業永續成長與經營的目標，端賴於管理階層具有前瞻性地視野、敏銳的策略規劃、健全的管理制度與人力資源充分有效的發揮。課程進行是以演講的方式介紹該集團各事業體相關之營運情形，讓同學們得以一窺業界實務工作的全貌，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。
description.en: The goals of perpetual management and growth of an enterprise are depend upon the top level of vision, lean thinking and strategy planning, organization system integration, and manpower resource effective utilization. The objective of this course is to introduce the practice application and manage a business group.

notes: 四管二.經管所和最後一哩合開,限300人,周三ABC上課

name.zh: 財經專業證照進階講座
name.en: Advance Seminar of Finance and Economic Professional Certification

description.zh: 為加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本財經專業證照進階講座，針對金融市場常識與職業道德與理財規劃人員課程，希望學生能夠學習基本的金融市場常識與金融從業人員應具備的職業道德，並進一步瞭解理財的流程，同時就個人或家庭的收支、儲蓄、住屋、子女教育、以及退休生活等規劃皆予明確分析，並舉實際案例詳予說明並闡釋各種相關理財金融機構之角色與功能，逐一介紹各類理財工具之特性及其有效之運用方法。對於未來有志從事金融機構財富管理業務之從業人員及大專院校財金系所學生，極適合作為其日常業務之參考、進修或準備應試之用。以培育學生參加並通過國內外財經專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the advance seminar of professional licenses in finance and economics, nurture students to participate in professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate finance and economics professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 四管四和最後一哩合開,限50人

name.zh: 資通訊產業鳥瞰與挑戰
name.en: Overview and Challenges of ICT Industry

description.zh: 以企業界實務經驗,提供學生對資通訊產業的基本認識,並培養學生在企業內簡報能力,課程包括講師自我介紹,學生分組,課程目的說明, 課程安排說明,資通訊產業環境與基本認知,品質意識與品牌基礎概念,資訊吸收方法與終身學習,學員發表與評分。
description.en: To provide students a general understanding and overview of how ICT industry operates and its challenges before entering job market. The course includes Introduction, ICT industry environment, Quality and brand, Lifelong learning, Final presentation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-越南文化與語言Ι
name.en: Development of global perspective:Vietnam culture and language Ι

description.zh: 課程以培養基礎越南語溝通能力、激發學習越南語興趣為宗旨。課程架構由發音學習開始，以奠定良好基礎，並以基礎語法與簡單對話為目標，培養學生越南語簡易聽、說、讀、寫能力。另外，結合多元化議題討論，增進其認識越南文化特色及台灣與越南經貿往來之現況，使其具備越南商務基本實力。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with the ability to communicate in Vietnamese and to stimulate students' interest. The course will start with the teaching of pronunciation and followed by basic grammar and simple conversation. Students are expected to have the ability to speak, listen, read and write. Furthermore, we will be discussing cross-cultural topics in our course. It is hoped that students can be familiar with Vietnamese culture and the current situation of economic and trade exchanges between Vietnam and Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授土木文化資產基本知識，培育工程與文化資產兼備之人才，以發揚文化資產之價值，提升我國文化層次及文明水準。透過授課、參訪及研究以培育文化資產之技術從業及學術研究人才，以加強文化資產之發掘、維護、保存及活化等作業內涵，促進其相關之學術、技術及技藝活動，以發揮文化資產相對價值，進而提升我國文明水準。
description.en: The course aims to develop an awareness of the diversity of issues related to civil engineering cultural assets and to nurture engineers with both engineering and cultural backgrounds so as to enhance the levels of cultural and civilization of our society. Through visits and lectures, students will be able to learn the historical development of civil engineering; the maintenance, preservation and revitalization of surviving historical civil engineering assets; and to appreciate and foster cultural assets.

notes: 四土四和最後一哩合開,限50人

description.zh: 學習Music Maker 16軟體的功能操作，並引導學生使用軟體加上課堂上教授的編曲要素、MIDI輸入、合成器的使用及混音技巧…等，融會貫通製作出自己的第一首歌。
description.en: To learn “Music Maker 16” functional operation, and to guide students working software on arranger elements, MIDI input, and the use of synthesizers and mixing skills. We expect students can produce their first song by performing music maker.

notes: 四文二和最後一哩合開,限40人,限文發系學生選課,計

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。
description.en:
1.Classification of VLSI circuit 
2.Flow of VLSI design 
3.VLSI characterization 
4.CMOS design methods
5.CMOS digital circuit 
6.High-level VLSI design
7.System partiton 
8.Time squence
9.Clock
10.VLSI testing 
11.Special projects

notes: 四子三甲和四資三合開

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。

6.High-level VLSI design
7.System partiton

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh符號，2.演算法之分析，3.集合、優先佇列，4.樹、平衡樹，5.排序演算法，6.搜尋演算法，7.圖形演算法，8.幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems之理論及對策。
description.en:
1.Complexity 
2.Analysis of algorithms
3.Set,priorty queue
4.Tree,Balanced tree
5.Sorting algorithms
6.Search algorithms
7.Graph algorithms
8.Geometry algorithms
9.NP-complete problems

description.zh:
(1)簡介
(2)FPGA系統
(3)FPGA結構
(4)組合邏輯設計
(5)順序機設計
(6)FPGA雛形系統設計

description.en:

(2)FPGA-Based Systems
(3)FPGA Fabrics
(4)Combinational Logic Design
(5)Sequential Machines Design
(6)FPGA Prototyping Systems Design
(7)FPGA Prototyping Systems Verification

name.zh: 精巧型電源轉換積體電路設計
name.en: Smart Power Conversion Integrated Circuit Design

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計精巧型電源轉換積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計精巧型電源轉換積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1. 介紹 2. 被動元件 3. 功率開關 4. 直流-直流電源轉換 5. 偏壓電路 6. 運算放大器 7. 參考電路 8. 邏輯控制電路 9. 電流感測電路 10. 保護電路 11. 頻率補償 12. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of smart power conversion integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of smart power conversion integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2. Passive components 3. Power switches 4. DC-DC power conversion 5. Bias circuits 6. Operational amplifiers 7. Reference circuits 8. Logic control circuits 9. Current sensing circuits 10. Protection circuits 11. Frequency compensation 12. Case study

name.zh: 積體電路佈局設計實務
name.en: Integrated Circuit Layout Design and Implementation

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟體來設計積體電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路佈局的能力,課程內容包含：1.佈局與電路的差異2.CMOS佈局的介紹3.電阻、電容的佈局介紹4.類比電路單元的佈局5.類比電路佈局的規劃6.輸入/輸出焊墊的介紹7.電感的佈局8.射頻電路的佈局9.電流鏡的佈局10.鎖相迴路的佈局11.雙級運算放大器的佈局12.交換電容分器的佈局13.低雜訊放大器的佈局14.數位類比轉換的佈局15.類比數位轉換器的佈局
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of integrated circuit layout. Therefore, the student has the design capability of integratd circuit layout. The contedts of this course:1.Differences between layout and circuit 2.CMOS layout style 3.R、C layout.4.Analog cell layout 5.Analog floor plan 6.I/O pad layout issue 7.L Layout 8.RF circuit layout 9.Current mirror layout 10.PLL layout 11.Two stage OPA layout 12.Switched capacitor integrator layout 13.LNA layout 14.D/A layout 15.A/D layout

name.zh: 生醫植入晶片系統實務
name.en: Special Projects on Biomedical Integrated System

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供修課學生對於生醫植入晶片在實務上的設計與應用。利用晶片植入系統擷取動物的生理參數或用以治療疾病，瞭解生理參數所代表的意義，以及設計新的生醫晶片系統架構來提昇目前的醫療技術。
description.en: The object of this course is to provide students for learning the special projects on Biomedical integrated system. Using the system to capture the animals' physiological parameters or to treatment diseases, and understand the meaning of these physiological parameters. Moreover, some techniques can be developed for improving the existing technologies.

notes: 四子四甲乙和電通所合開

description.zh:
1.醫用電子學之基礎。
2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。
3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。
4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。
5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。
6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。
7.生醫電訊號處理技術。
8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。
9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。
10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。
11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。
12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en:
1.Fundamental of medical electronics。
2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。
3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。
4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of     biomedical system。
5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 
6. Medical measurement theory and technology。
7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。
8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。
9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。
10.Designs of b

notes: 四子四甲乙合開,停開【停開】

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1.半導體元件簡介 2.物理氣相沉積 3.化學氣相沉積 4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

name.zh: 醫療電子應用設計專題
name.en: Project for Medical Electronics Application Design

description.zh:
本課程運用跨領域專長整合共同設計開發醫療電子應用系統或服務
內容包含:
(1) 生醫檢測儀表系統設計與製作課程模組規劃如下：
生醫檢測儀表系統概論、生醫檢測之光電設計實務、嵌入式系統之醫療儀表應用實務、無線網路與生醫儀表整合設計、醫療器材品質系統查驗實務
(2) 睡眠感測元件設計與製作課程模組規劃如下：
睡眠相關概念與其量測方法、可攜帶式睡眠監測硬體設計、演算法設計、睡眠感測後端資料整合系統開發
(3) 無線健康整合服務系統應用於失智老人之照護
RFID 室內安全監控系統、RFID戶外安全監控系統、GPS-GSM戶外安全監控系統、警急救援軟體平台
description.en:
This course integrates interdisciplinary expertise to design for medical electronics applications and services, and the contents are as follows.
(1) Biomedical instrumentation system design and implementation
Topics include: introduction to biomedical instrumentation system, design practices for biomedical optics, application practices for embedded medical instrumentation, integration design of wireless networks and biomedical instrumentation, and quality inspection practices for medical devices
(2) Sleep sensing component design and implementation
Topics include: sleep-related concepts and their measurement methods, hardware and algorithm design for portable sleep monitoring system, and system development for sleep sensing back-end data integration 
(3) Integrated wireless health care service systems for elders with dementia
Topics include: RFID indoor security surveillance system, RFID outdoor security monitoring system, GPS-GSM outdoor security monitoring system, and software

description.zh:
1.簡介：概觀、資訊源、通道、通訊品質、數位通訊系統
2.信號與系統：傅立葉轉換、線性系統
3.類比數位變換：取樣、量化、脈碼調變
4.機率與隨機程序
5.基頻脈波傳送：相配濾波器、信號間干擾與脈波塑型、等化
6.數位通頻傳輸：ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MSK
7.多工與展頻技術：分頻多工、分時多工、直序列與跳頻分碼多工
8.源編碼：熵、資料緊縮、霍夫曼編碼、資料壓縮、JPEG
9.通道編碼：線性區塊碼、迴旋碼
description.en:
1.introduction :overview,information sources,channels,quality 
measurement,a closer look of modern digital communication systems
2.Signals and Systems:Fourier transform,linear systems
3.A/D Conversion :sampling ,quantization ,PCM
4.Probability and Random Process
5.Baseband Pulse Transmission :matched filters,ISI and shaping ,qeualization
6.Digital Passband Transmisson:ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MAK
7.Multiplexing and Spread Sprctrum   Techniques:FDMA,TDMA,direct sequence and frequency hopping   CDMA
8.Source Coding:entropy ,data compaction,Huffman coding,data   compression,JPEG
9.Channel Coding :linear block codes,convolutional codes

description.zh:
透過下列授課方式由學生自己彙整出各種學習方法以具備進入職場再學習之能力
1.閱讀學習相關書籍後之心得分享與討論
2.授課老師之企業轉型經驗分享
3.探討企業轉型實例並分析組織學習能力與轉型績效之關係
description.en:
英文概述
English Description 	This course is to discuss and summarize learning skills to well prepare students in professional envioronments.It includes 
(1) discussion and reviews in related reading assignments; (2) experience sharing from experts in industries; (3) case analysis and study in the relation between learning skills and performance in organization level.

description.zh: 課程主要藉由Rhinoceros曲面軟體之泛用性，針對產品外觀造形設計之實務需求、學習正確之曲面軟體建模技巧與觀念、並能應用在其它相關設計領域；幫助學生創意發想與造型創作不設限，並大大縮短產品開發時程並提升工作效率。
description.en: To be an effective designer today, you need tools to quickly develop your designs and accurately communicate them to everyone in the product research, development, marketing, and manufacturing or construction process. This course introduces the computer aided modeling design，teach students how to use Rhinoceros software to create accurately and high quality surface model and document your designs ready for rendering, animation, drafting, engineering, analysis, and manufacturing or construction.

description.zh: 介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
description.en: Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 本課程探討處理空間資料的模式與演算法則，主題包含: (1) 空間資料庫介紹與應用, (2) 空間概念與資料模式, (3) 空間搜尋語言, (4) 空間資料儲存與索引, (5) 搜尋處理與最佳化, (6) 空間網路, (7) 空間資料庫的研究趨勢。
description.en: This course studies the models and algorithms for the efficient handling of data related to space. The topics include: (1) Introduction to Spatial Databases, (2) Spatial Concepts and Data Models, (3) Spatial Query Languages, (4) Spatial Storage and Indexing, (5) Query Processing and Optimization, (6) Spatial Networks, and (7) Trends on Spatial Databases.

name.zh: 創新講座--文化生活創意

description.zh: 本課程係提供本校學生與創意界交流的平台，提供學生建立人文藝術相關之涵養，並協助學生體驗文化生活創意之實務過程，透過邀請國內著名之文化生活創意相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，經由專家之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生透過自身生活之經驗學習創意發展之可能性，開發其創意之潛能。
description.en:
Course Description：
    This course provide a platform to generate between student and creativity. It could students to build the temperament of human arts, and experience practical process of cultural life creativity. Through the invitation of the cultural life creative expert in production, official, education to have a speech. By the way of sharing and passing down, it could stimulate the learning creative develop possibility of students in their daily life, and develop the potential of creativity.

notes: 四設二三四.創新所和最後一哩合開,一ABC節,限150人

description.zh: 「室內設計就業規畫」的課程目標旨在提供學生未來從事室內設計相關工作的就業與創業準備。課程邀請產業界主管或負責人，透過專題演講、企業參訪、校外教學等方式，教授學生室內設計相關就業與創業知識與實務經驗。
description.en: The aim of「Interior Design Career Plan」is to provide students knowledge for participating in the interior design or related industry in the near future. By means of lectures, visiting specific places, the course invites leading entrepreneurs and directors from interior design firms to share their knowledge and experience.

notes: 四設三和最後一哩合開,一34,限30人,已修習室內設計

description.zh: (1)熟悉3D塑膠產品設計；(2)學會應用2D與3D軟體的操作模具設計與拆模；(3)射出成形模具的構造元件之規格與設計；(4)模具零件分解圖；(5)模具組立圖。
description.en: (1) To realize the 3D plastic molding part's design. (2)Mold design and dissolution by 3D CAD software. (3) Injection mold parts design and specification. (4) The explosion diagram of mold parts. (5) Injection mold assembly.

notes: 四機三甲和最後一哩合開,限30人

name.en: District heating and cooling system  technology

description.zh: 區域冷暖房系統，係指將大型區域或特定建築物群之空調系統加以整合規劃，把供應空調所需之冰水主機、鍋爐及發電機等重大設備，統籌集中於一主機中，利用共通管路輸送冷、暖氣及熱水至各使用地區。由於空調系統經過整合，各區空調需求之參差因數可互補，故系統互通效應更高，冰水主機或鍋爐容量可大為降低，其次本系統作為工廠廢熱、垃圾焚化發電以及供給大學校園電力，冷氣與暖氣、溫水等，皆能到達總耗能效率80%以上。
description.en: All district energy systems have four basic components: a fuel source, the central production plant, a distribution network, and its connected customers. Typically the thermal energy is used for space hearing, space cooling, or process needs and when combined with the production of electricity in central plant is also considered to be a cogeneration  facility. Combined heating, cooling and power generation in a single facility can offer attractive investment returns with lower capital costs than other alternatives.

name.zh: 國際觀培養-泰國文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language

description.zh:
1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。
2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。
3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。
4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en:
1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan.
2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc.
3. In terms of learning Thai, listening, speaking, reading and writing, these four skills are equally important. Student will be trained to learn all these four skills together. At first, s

name.zh: 國際觀培養-印尼文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective:Indonesian culture and language

description.zh: 為了迎接全球化的亞洲國家與東南亞國家之間的經濟發展,藉由傳授印尼語言,讓學生掌握印尼語同時也了解印尼文化作為兩國的經濟橋樑，以此來協助學生前往印尼就業。本課程是培養學生的溝通能力，以運用印尼語來跟印尼母語者打招呼、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to teach Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) and equip students not only with the language but also to understand the culture as an economic bridge between the two countries. And, it is hoped that assisting students in employment in Indonesia. This course will aim to help students to develop communication skills by utilizing Indonesian language to speak to native speakers in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, and descriptive usage…etc.

notes: 限30人,四光四和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。
description.en:
The purpose of this course is study the concept of commercialization and how to sale the products to marketing through the consistent process.
It’ll ask student to find the consumer's requirements from observation, then think and confirm the design purpose. The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

notes: 四設四.創新所和最後一哩合開,限20人,有修課限制

description.zh: 介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
description.en: Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

notes: 四設二三合開,產品組,限15人

description.zh: 介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
description.en: Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

name.zh: 文化創意發展趨勢與機會
name.en: Tendency and Opportunity of Culture and Creativity Development

description.zh:
本課程將針對「文化」與「創意」兩大部分，讓學生認識文化產業與創意產業的整體架構與範疇，同時探討台灣與各國之文創產業發展與現況，讓學生得以將學術知識轉化為實務運作之技能。
    本課程將以文化與創意知識傳遞配合故事工作坊之設計，使文化與創意利用故事模式與角色原型在產品設計、品牌加值的流程而連接到自我與地域環境的關係。並透過分組的專案執行，共同發掘問題、解決問題，在過程中得到有意義的跨領域學習。
description.en:
This course mainly focuses on two aspects, "culture" and "creativity", and aims at helping students to cognize the structure and categories of culture industry, also investigating industrial development and current status in Taiwan and worldwide, further enables students to transform the academic knowledge into professional practice. 
The course will deliver culture and creativity knowledge through story workshops, utilizing narration pattern and character archetype to the process of designing products and branding, further connecting the knowledge to the relationship between self and regional environment. Students will be divided into groups, discover and solve problems together through executing a project, and obtain meaningful interdisciplinary learning experience.

notes: 四文二和最後一哩合開

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。四技修三學期，而在每一學期修完時如欲換題目時需等老師將該學期成績打出後再徵求原來及新老師都同意才可更換題目。
description.en: The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor. Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester. The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師涂菀凌,北大三峽校區商學院1F01博雅選修文學

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而?化社會適應能力。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

notes: 教師侯美惠,北大三峽校區社會學院1F02博雅選修社會

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師謝馥年,醫大3101教室博雅選修文學

Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師王瑜君,醫大8004教室博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。

description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Students participate in one of the corporative engineering companies during curriculum session, practice and experience in the materials and mineral resources engineering related fields . A practice intern and a written report must be completed to meet the course requirement.

notes: 需系上申請通過始得修習

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師陳瑞玲,醫大8003博雅選修歷史

description.zh: 主要課程內容包括Visual Basic或C程式語言介紹及應用。
description.en: The major course includes the introduction of Visual Basic or C programming language and application.

notes: 計網電腦教室,限工程班三年級修課

description.zh: 介紹產品設計初期形成設計策略所必需了解的美學、機能及工程等因素，並講授產品分析之基本理論與方法。藉由實際案例的說明與練習使學習者體會產品分析之方法並討論分析結果之意涵。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and methods of product analysis, which is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Case study will be carried out with implication of the results discussed followed by practical exercise in analysing a specific group of product.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。空調的基本原理、冷凍的基本循環原理，冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Pipin and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

description.zh: 本課程由學生與老師共同選定題目，在特定題目下對此專題之問題定義，分析，推理，設計，製作與解決方法進行研究，以完成該專題之成品，專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品，以培養實務工作之能力。專題範圍包含：1.電子電路，2.電子儀表，3.控制與通訊系統，4.電子視聽系統，5.微電腦為基礎之計算機硬體（含軟體）製作，6.軟體設計與製作（PC，工作站），影像處理與計算機視覺，多媒體製作（動畫、Video、Audio及其整合），9.其他。
description.en:
In this course,students will conduct special project under the guidance of his advisor.The topic of this project,selected and decided by bath the student and his advisor,could be chosen form(but not limited to)
1.Electronic circuits
2.Electronic instrumentation
3.Communication and control systems
4.Microprocessor applications
5.Multimedia system designs
6.Computer networks
7.Computer software desgin

name.zh: 語文領域英語教學實習

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至機械相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative mechanical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至化學工程與生物科技相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the chemical engineering and biotechnology related fields in one of the corporative chemical engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative chemical engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，修課學生必須至化學、化工相關機構實習，參與校外合作工廠所提供之實質訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative chemical or chemical engineering company, practice and learn the real operation in the field of molecular science and engineering. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至電機相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation is carried out in one of the corporative electrical engineering company during curriculum session. The students practice and learn the real operation of the electrical engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學年至電子工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習12個月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the electronic engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative electronic engineering company full-time at least 12 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期至電子工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the electronic engineering related fields in one of the corporative electronic engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative electronic engineering company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習18週，每週不得低於2.5天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

name.zh: 輸送現象與單元操作（三）

notes: 國立臺北商業技術學院
國立臺北護理健康大學
國立臺北護理健康大學

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階法語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their French abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the French language.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
中文課程共分四年三階段授課。
第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。
第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。
第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en:
The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. 
In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language.
In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. 
In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行為一學分三小  時，內容偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for one semester; and 3 laboratorial hours per week. The experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1. to identify the physical laws, 2. to cultivate students' earnest manner and methods of science, 3. to cultivate their ability of data reduction, 4. to instruct them to solve the problems of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。力系的平衡、摩擦、面積與質量慣性矩、結構分析、虛功法。
description.en: Equivalent Systems of Forces, Static Equilibrium ,Area And Mass Moments of Inertia, Analysis of Structures, Methods of Virtual Work.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001014或負責教授同意。依所欠專長及發展專題需要選項實習，每學期以兩項為原則，項次含：1.綜合機工實習。2.數值控制機器實習。3. 控制實習、4.量測實習。
description.en:
Prerequisite:  Consent of Instructor
Contents: (1)Integrated Machining Shop (2)NC Shop
          (3)Control Shop (4)Measurement Shop
Students, depending on their own specialties and interests, shall choose at least one of the four catagories.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: 以CAD繪圖軟體為教學範本，熟悉及應用繪圖指令，繪製機械之二度、三度空間的機械圖形，並能充分應用電腦的功能，以達輔助機械製圖及電腦輔助設計為目標。
description.en:
Prerequisite: ME151 or Consent of Instructor
Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.zh: 工程地質學為地質科學之應用學門之一，本課程之內容在介紹工程地質的一般關念及基本原理，包括工程地質學導論、工程工址調查重點、工程地質中之材料因素、岩體中之弱面、地質作用的動力與岩石之褶皺、工程地質之計量化及其應用、工程地質在自然邊坡穩定之應用、各種自然岩石與土壤之簡介、工程地質在水庫工程之應用、工程地質在壩工之應用、工程地質在隧道工程之應用、工址調查之目的方法與程序、工程地質圖簡介、地質鑽探與現地試驗、工程地質中之環境因素等部份。
description.en: This course of Engineering Geology is designed as an upper-division course for undergraduate geology majors and graduate students, with an emphasis on construction or environmental concerns. Also enrolled are civil engineers with a background in geology and those who are interested in geologic applications to construction. The course builds on a basic knowledge of geology by relating geology to engineering fundamentals and construction concepts. The topics of this course include 1.Origin and development of the earth, 2.Introduction to the Engineering Geology, 3.Elements of Rock and Soil Mechanics, 4.Engineering properties of rocks, 5.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.The weak planes in the rock body, 7.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.Geologic hazards, 7.The rock mass classification and rating, 8.Landslides, subsidence, and slope stability, 9.Site investigation, 10.Case study in the Engineering Geology

name.zh: 國合專論A-高等生物化學

description.zh: 分子科學是現代科學發展的基礎，尤其是在生物醫學相關領域。培養優良的分子科學人才的培養，是帶動國家發展相關科技產業的動力，也是現代化國家必要的競爭能力。寄生蟲學隨著分子科學新技術及新理論的發展，過去二十過年分子寄生蟲學的發展相當快速。由於分子寄生蟲學對整體科學進步的貢獻，今年美國國家科學院邀請Paul T.Englund教授(本校榮譽國際講座教授，專長分子寄生蟲學及生物化學)為新任的美國國家科學院院士，更進一步說明分子寄生蟲對科學發展的重要性。除此之外，台灣位於亞熱帶，多屬邦交國也同處亞熱帶，屬寄生蟲相關疾病常發生的地區。因此，分子寄生蟲學在臨床醫學上，也具有其應用性。本課程透過講解與學生論談方式，讓學生能達到立即理解與實用功效。預期學生修過此課程後，將更能發揮其知識於未來研究發展應用。
description.en: The main content of this course includes: 1.Basic biochemistry 2.Glycobiology and molecular parasitology 3.DNA Replication and Molecular parasitology 5.Student workshop-1 6.Student workshop-2 4.Student workshop-3

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制、數值控制、幾何資料處理、進給驅動器、NC機器的位置量測系統、自動化加工的機器監視與診斷、電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

description.zh: 探討有關無機物質的化學性質、原子結構及化學反應。討論在材料及礦物上之應用。
description.en: Chemical properties, atomic structure and chemical reactions of inorganic chemicals will be discussed.  Their applications to material science and minerals will be 	discussed too.
